'''Firework Flare-Up''' is [[Yoimiya]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|conversion|talent=Niwabi Fire-Dance|character=Yoimiya|Pyro|10}}
* The Kindling Arrows home in much as [[Diona]]'s [[Icy Paws]] do. They can home in on [[wildlife]] like birds and boars as well as other targets such as torches, [[Berries]], and hay bales.
* Unlike [[Amber]]'s fully charged [[Aimed Shot]]s, Yoimiya's fully charged Aimed Shots (and Kindling Arrows) do not burn grass unless at least two of them land in the same place in a short period of time. This is due to Yoimiya's charged shots only applying 1 [[Gauge Unit Theory|gauge]] of {{Pyro}} while Amber's applies 2.
* {{TalentNote|icd|Kindling Arrow DMG}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Naganohara Meteor Swarm}}
